properties.name: grpc.server.address
properties.description: Bind address for the server. Defaults to {@code 0.0.0.0}.

properties.name: grpc.server.health-service-enabled
properties.description: Whether grpc health service is enabled or not. Defaults to {@code true}.

properties.name: grpc.server.max-inbound-message-size
properties.description: The maximum message size in bytes allowed to be received by the server. If not set ({@code null}) then it will default to {@link GrpcUtil#DEFAULT_MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE DEFAULT_MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE}. If set to {@code -1} then it will use {@link Integer#MAX_VALUE} as limit.

properties.name: grpc.server.port
properties.description: Server port to listen on. Defaults to {@code 9090}. If set to {@code 0} a random available port will be selected and used.

properties.name: grpc.server.reflection-service-enabled
properties.description: Whether proto reflection service is enabled or not. Defaults to {@code true}.
